name: Jumpy Wizards
description:
Welcome to Jumpy Wizards!

In this platform game, you play as a wizard that climbs a level based tower. But it's not just jumping without threat, you can be attacked by spikes, bombs, fire and a huge amount of other objects!

This "great" game includes:

  • Pixel-art
  • Nearly acceptable animations
  • Buggy jumping
  • No story
  • The ability to shoot anything you like (except those other things)
  • The feeling of extreme satisfaction when completing level 1

So what are you waiting for? You don't have anything better to do, that's why you're sorting by new!
